title: League wont open/Download
body: I wanted to play league but i got this error that wont let me play. so i tried to uninstall the game and redownload and i got another error that wont let me download it. if i can get help ill be very happy. Thanks!

replies.body: Was this the same error you received when you tried to download League after uninstalling it?

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=hlY9EXlq,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-12-13T04:32:07.351+0000)
>
> Was this the same error you received when you tried to download League after uninstalling it?

 no. i was given this error  http://imgur.com/SnypQYv

Are you using Advanced Installer to install League? o.O

I'd recommend installing League by following [**this guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends) to a T. If you have any other errors while installing, let me know.
I tried downloading CCleaner but it wont. is there a way to get rid of advanced installer?
Can you simply uninstall it [**the normal way**](http://www.wikihow.com/Remove-Programs-(Windows-7)) you uninstall a program?
Its not in the programs to uninstalll

Ah, in that case, you may need to use an advanced uninstaller such as [**Wise Uninstaller**](http://www.wisecleaner.com/wise-program-uninstaller.html) or [**Revo Uninstaller**](http://www.revouninstaller.com/) to take care of it.

Let me know if either worked!
so i downloaded Wise uninstaller and cant find the advanced installer again. the only thing popping up is "App Installer" should i uninstall that?

I don't know without seeing what you're looking at. I'd say at this point, you may need to reach out to Advanced Installer's [**Support Team**](http://www.advancedinstaller.com/support.html) in order to get this uninstalled before you can try a clean League reinstall.

Get back at me if you have any questions.
